titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services.

action.text: Committee on Armed Services ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Armed Services. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Warner. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on February 13, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services for the 108th Congress.
